body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Thomas King. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Sandra Evans.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra. To assist you better, may I kindly ask for your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, one zero nine eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sandra. Can you also provide your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing those details, Sandra. Is there anything specific you need help with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling surprised by a billing issue. I didn't expect such a high fee.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Sandra. Let's work together to resolve this. Thank you for reaching out and for sharing your information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time. Have a great day, Sandra. Goodbye.
